pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: WIN7 SP1/WIN8/WIN10/XP
  • Processor: Intel Core2DUO 2GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX9.0 VRAM128MB
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: PCM

short_description: This soundtrack includes BGMs and songs from Rough Episodes and Coloured Episodes, which are all composed by project lights. As you push forward the plots, the playable soundtracks will increase. Games may end, love may fade, but music will haunt us...as it always does. – Producer: Evil Jeff
supported_languages:
Simplified Chinese*, English
*languages with full audio support
